item.title: Tristan (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Tristan (not verified)
item.description: I will totally buy one of those!

item.title: Soulmech (not verified): Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: Soulmech (not verified)
item.description:
I would probably buy one. Help get the word out and all that.

Shirts cost money though, and I wouldn't go ahead with this unless it is likely it'll be profitable or if there's a lot of extra money.

item.title: phobos: Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: our goal would be to break even, not profit off the shirts. The goal is to spread Tor.

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 4
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description: I would buy a green one, but I'm afraid the purple one is not very well designed in my opinion. Put a green one up and I'd buy!

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 5
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description: Offer more colors for the map-shirt and you've got me.

item.title: StrangeCharm (not verified): Comment 7
item.dcterms:creator: StrangeCharm (not verified)
item.description: I like the idea of selling t-shirts, but these designs aren't great. The map is a nice idea, but the implementation could be much better.

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 8
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description:
One shirt needs to be black. Geeks always by black (I know, all generalizations are wrong, starting with this one).

That being said, shirts are a good way to promote the project and to (possibly) make a bit of money.

More designs might be good too. Maybe one more artsy/conceptual/whatever you want to call it. One that puts more emphasis on looking good than anything else. A good looking shirt attracts more attention.

All in all, I think I would buy one, so another vote for the idea.

item.title: phobos: Comment 9
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: We have black t-shirts already. See https://blog.torproject.org/blog/black-t-shirts-user-request

item.description:
It would be cool to have earth super-imposed on an onion as picture on either the front or back of the t-shirt - I would say front, and on the back:

Test Our Resolve

or:

Talk Of Reason

or:

?

item.title: Tor-shirt (not verified): Comment 11

item.description:
My shot at a T-shirt design.
http://img2.pict.com/63/8c/bd/1792161/0/torshirtd1e4d21f80290019a813e00e...

I presume the T-shirts are going to be made in China

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 13
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description:
I like the 'surfing freely' slogan, or something that otherwise gives some idea of what Tor is. I'd prefer, say, a navy blue, or something, to green or purple though. Black would likely be a popular color but my own preference would be for a dark blue or green or something. I kind of like the world map thing, but less stylized, perhaps wireframe outlines of the landmasses. Additional thought, perhaps with an example route, arcing or straight line mapping between various nodes.

But yeah, something like that, or something, would be awesome, and I'd love a Tor tshirt

item.description: i like the shirt, really cool looking. nice article.
